channel.title: Ethereal-Ps] Vps Hosted 24/7 Has alot Features :)
channel.description:
http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g54/EtherealPS/Ethereal-PS/logo_zpsthqlcccq.png
Uunique features of the Server: - Ironman mode - Deadman mode - Great membership benefits - Completionist (with colour changing) and max cape - Tutorial island (Can be skipped) - Quests - Factions - Prestiging - All skills are trainable even with a new custom dungeon skill - Pk points and pk point store. - Titles - Gold scrolls - Single players dungeons / 20+ man raids - Money vault - Achievements with even an achievement cape! - Bosses with unique attacks and special features - Boss slayer tasks and more! - Daily quests to complete
Minigames - Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Cave - Duel Arena - Dominion Tower - Nightmare Zone
Bosses - Godwars - King Black Dragon - Dagannoth Kings - Chaos Eleental - Glacors - The Great Yeti - Sea Troll Queen - Necrovarus - Pernix
Media [spoiler] [img]http://i.imgur.com/r0wIxao.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zW9n9aU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/f3Mo04n.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4BXNVba.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qnCfOqP.png[/img] [/spoiler] [/quote]
http://www.ethereal-ps.pw/forums/ http://www.ethereal-ps.pw/

item.title: Ethereal-Ps] Vps Hosted 24/7 Has alot Features :)
item.dc:creator: @Ghostrsps Ghostrsps
item.description:
@Ghostrsps wrote:

[quote=“furyking50, post:4, topic:555169”][quote author=Beast K link=topic=674094.msg4506929#msg4506929 date=1460418455]
it is sorry for no media
[/quote]

Atleast you’re admitting to it unlike 757Ghost’s rsps, trying to say he made it from scratch :palm: :palm:

OT: good luck![/quote]

Please tell me where i said i mad it from nothing… please show me this post

[quote=“Beast K, post:1, topic:555169”]http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g54/EtherealPS/Ethereal-PS/logo_zpsthqlcccq.png

Uunique features of the Server:

  • Ironman mode
  • Deadman mode
  • Great membership benefits
  • Completionist (with colour changing) and max cape
  • Tutorial island (Can be skipped)
  • Quests
  • Factions
  • Prestiging
  • All skills are trainable even with a new custom dungeon skill
  • Pk points and pk point store.
  • Titles
  • Gold scrolls
  • Single players dungeons / 20+ man raids
  • Money vault
  • Achievements with even an achievement cape!
  • Bosses with unique attacks and special features
  • Boss slayer tasks and more!
  • Daily quests to complete

Minigames

  • Barrows
  • Pest Control
  • Tzhaar Cave
  • Duel Arena
  • Dominion Tower
  • Nightmare Zone

Bosses

  • Godwars
  • King Black Dragon
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Chaos Eleental
  • Glacors
  • The Great Yeti
  • Sea Troll Queen
  • Necrovarus
  • Pernix
